groq.header:
Groq is a cheap and super fast AI
Generate content from triggers or ask for a conversation summary
groq.instructions: You need to create an account on Groq and request an API Key
groq.usage:
You can now use Groq AI to generate content from the {TRIGGERS}.
Also, when opening a conversation between users you'll get an option to generate a summary of the conversation so you don't have to read it all.
groq.conversation_preprompt: Generate a very short summary of this Twitch chat conversation. {'@'}xxx are mentions of other users. Only answer the summary.
groq.summarize_title: Limit the number of messages to summarize
groq.param_ignore_short: Ignore short or mostly emote messages
groq.param_preprompt_placeholder: Give instructions on what you want Groq to analyse...
